snippet: The American defense secretary said the actions do not violate Pakistan’s sovereignty.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta brushes aside concerns that drone strikes against leaders of Al Qaeda in Pakistan violate that country’s sovereignty; remarks, which were made after a speech in India, show yet again how strained the relationship between Islamabad and Washington has become.
lead_paragraph: The American defense secretary said the actions do not violate Pakistan’s sovereignty.

headline.seo: In New Delhi, Leon E. Panetta Defends Drone Strikes in Pakistan
headline.main: Defense Chief Shrugs Off Objections to Drones
headline.print_headline: Defense Chief Shrugs Off Objections To Drones

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
